content: betty s lazy mixer - a 6-day kid blanket https //www bettymcknit com/6daykidblanket variation a crochet pattern by betty mcknit introduction the 6-day kid blanket 6dkb originally written for a toddler-size blanket made with chunky weight yarn can easily be made in 6 days betty s lazy mix is betty s favorite way to mix cakes the blanket uses worsted weight yarn and is sized to make an adult twin-bed sized blanket this pattern does work up quickly in any size but this version will likely take longer than six days give yourself about two weeks working an hour or two every day how to resize if you would like to make a different size blanket see the 6-day kid blanket pattern for advice about resizing my resize video on youtube along with a swatch on 37 chains will help you figure out how to resize to your liking
